whirling blade.name: Whirling Blade
whirling blade.desc: A chitinous scythe to cut through your foes in a whirl.

abyssal ridge.name: Abyssal Ridge
abyssal ridge.desc: Send a cascading eruption towards your foes, forcing them to react.

pumpkin pitch.name: Pumpkin Pitch
pumpkin pitch.desc: Lob explosive pumpkins at your foes. Note: Requires Hallowtide '23 Seasonal Medal.

dread breath.name: Dread Breath
dread breath.desc: Channels the song through the power of the Dread Serpent.

mecha gatling.name: Mecha Gatling
mecha gatling.desc: Let loose a torrent of bullets from your shoulder mounted minigun.
